name: 莊嶸騰
objective:
本課程探討低軌衛星通訊技術及應用，課程涵蓋的主題包括：
1.	低軌衛星通訊系統簡介
2.	低軌衛星通訊的特性與效能分析
3.	低軌衛星通訊產業應用
4.	立方及微衛星通訊酬載設計
5.	低軌衛星地面站系統
6.	低軌衛星通訊關鍵議題探討
This course discusses low-orbit satellite communication technologies and related applications. The topics include the followings:
1.	Introduction to Low Earth Orbit (LEO) Satellite Communications Systems
2.	Characteristics and Performance Analysis of LEO Satellite Communications
3.	Applications of LEO Satellite Communications
4.	Payload Design of CubeSat and Small Satellites
5.	LEO Satellite Ground Station System
6.	Key Issues in LEO Satellite Communications
schedule:
Week 1: Unit 1. Introduction to low-orbit satellite communication system
Week 2~3: Unit 2. Characteristics and performance analysis of low-orbit satellite communications
Week 4~6: Unit 3. Low-orbit satellite communication industry application
Week 7~8: Unit 4. Cubic and microsatellite communication payload design
Week 9: Midterm report.
Week 10~11: Unit 5. Low-orbit satellite ground station system
Week 12~13: Unit 6. Discussion on key issues in low-orbit satellite communications
Week 14~15: Unit 7. Term-Project 1
Week 16~17: Unit 8. Term-Project 2
Week 18: Final report.
scorePolicy:
Class Participation (30%)
Midterm report. (30%)
Final report. (40%)
